entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 7.
